com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core
Class ChangeProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.ChangeProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
CapabilityProvider, UnitProvider
public class ChangeProvider
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a common base type for UnitProvider, CapabilityProvider as well as the mechanism for participants to provide changes to the Synchronization Framework.

Since:
1.0

Method Detail

canReflect

public boolean canReflect()
Return true if the current provider can reflect values from artifacts in the workspace. Defaults to "true".

Returns:
True if the current provider can reflect values from artifacts in the workspace.

canImplement

public boolean canImplement()
Return true if the current provider can reflect values from artifacts in the workspace. Defaults to "true".

Returns:
True if the current provider can reflect values from artifacts in the workspace.

createReflectionChange

public Change[] createReflectionChange(Unit unit,
                                       IProgressMonitor monitor)
Create a change object to carry out modifications to the set of Units based on the current state of the reflected artifacts.

Parameters:
unitChange - A change object, which may be undoable, to carry out changes necessary in order to synchronize the state of the external artifacts with the state of the model.
unit - The affected unit, chosen by the user, to update in the model.
Returns:
A change object, which may be undoable, to carry out changes necessary in order to synchronize the state of the model with the state of the external artifacts.

createImplementationChange

public Change[] createImplementationChange(Unit unit,
                                           IProgressMonitor monitor)
Create a change object to carry out modifications to the workspace or external artifacts in order to synchronize the external artifacts witht the model.

Parameters:
unitChange - A change object, which may be undoable, to carry out changes necessary in order to synchronize the state of the external artifacts with the state of the model.
unit - The affected unit, chosen by the user, to update in the workspace or external artifacts. The set of units may not be the entire set of units contained in a given Topology, and not all given Units may be recognizable by this CapabilityProvider.
monitor - A progress monitor to provide feedback to the user about the current step of the operation.
Returns:
An non-null array of changes that could be carried out on implementation. Be aware that the user may choose to only carry out a subset of these changes.

createImportChange

public Change[] createImportChange(Topology topology,
                                   TopologyUnitStub stub,
                                   IProgressMonitor monitor)
Create a change object to carry out modifications to the set of Units based on the current state of the reflected artifacts.

Parameters:
unitChange - A change object, which may be undoable, to carry out changes necessary in order to synchronize the state of the external artifacts with the state of the model.
stub - The affected stub, reflected by the unit provider, and chosen by the user to add to the model.
Returns:
A change object, which may be undoable, to carry out changes necessary in order to synchronize the state of the model with the state of the external artifacts.

checkConditionsForImplementation

public RefactoringStatus checkConditionsForImplementation(Unit unit,
                                                          IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                                   throws OperationCanceledException
Called prior to the creation of an implementation change. Clients should use this hook to validate whether all conditions are met for the given unit to be implemented.

Parameters:
unit - The unit that is to be implemented.
monitor - A monitor to track the progress of the validation.
Returns:
A RefactoringStatus indicating whether there will be any problem with carrying out the implementation. Returning RefactoringStatus#FATAL will cause the implementation to be aborted.
Throws:
OperationCanceledException - If the progress monitor is cancelled while the validation is taking place.

checkConditionsForReflection

public RefactoringStatus checkConditionsForReflection(Unit unit,
                                                      IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                               throws OperationCanceledException
Called prior to the creation of an reflected change. Clients should use this hook to validate whether all conditions are met for the given unit to be implemented.

Parameters:
unit - The unit that is to be reflected.
monitor - A monitor to track the progress of the validation.
Returns:
A RefactoringStatus indicating whether there will be any problem with carrying out the reflected. Returning RefactoringStatus#FATAL will cause the reflected to be aborted.
Throws:
OperationCanceledException - If the progress monitor is cancelled while the validation is taking place.

checkConditionsForImport

public RefactoringStatus checkConditionsForImport(TopologyUnitStub stub,
                                                  IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                           throws OperationCanceledException
Called prior to the creation of an import change. Clients should use this hook to validate whether all conditions are met for the given unit to be implemented.

Parameters:
stub - The stub that is to be imported.
monitor - A monitor to track the progress of the validation.
Returns:
A RefactoringStatus indicating whether there will be any problem with carrying out the import. Returning RefactoringStatus#FATAL will cause the import to be aborted.
Throws:
OperationCanceledException - If the progress monitor is cancelled while the validation is taking place.
